com.chriswlucas.restaurant

Class CustomerCLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chriswlucas.restaurant.UserInterface
      • com.chriswlucas.restaurant.UserCLI
        • com.chriswlucas.restaurant.CustomerCLI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerUI

    public class CustomerCLI
extends UserCLI
implements CustomerUI
    Sets up a command line interface for the customers.
    Author:
    Nick Anderson, Jonathon Bundy.
